alert.note: Alert for Ste. Genevieve (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 1:56PM CDT until July 04 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL RANDOLPH AND NORTHEASTERN STE. GENEVIEVE COUNTIES... At 156 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ste. Genevieve, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ste. Genevieve and Kellogg. This also includes Felix Valle House State Park. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri near exit 150. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
